abstract: NBA Roundup; Brooklyn Nets defeat Chicago Bulls, 105-102; other basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Brook Lopez had 21 points and 12 rebounds for the Nets, who were coming off one of their worst performances, a home loss to the Timberwolves.

headline.main: Nets Hold On to Beat Bulls, Stopping Skid at Five Games
headline.print_headline: Nets Hold On to Beat Bulls, Stopping Skid at Five Games

snippet: Brook Lopez had 21 points and 12 rebounds for the Nets, who were coming off one of their worst performances, a home loss to the Timberwolves.
